title: Machine Learning-Based Energy Efficiency Optimization Design for Arid Climate Dome Structures: Strengthening Technical Expression and Language Analysis

context.prior_knowledge: Basic architectural design principles, fundamental thermodynamics concepts, experience with parametric modeling tools (Rhino/Grasshopper), energy simulation understanding, technical writing and basic data visualization skills, and specialized terminology proficiency
context.additional_context: Focuses on acquiring practical technical skills for current professionals. Combines hands-on practice using digital devices (tablets/laptops). Emphasizes technical report writing, presentation skills, and specialized vocabulary utilization during learning. Particularly evaluates accuracy of technical language and data visualization (charts/graphs) expression abilities.

learning_goals: Development of technical writing skills for predicting the thermal performance of dome structures in arid climate conditions using multivariate polynomial regression (MPR) models, with an emphasis on specialized vocabulary.

Strengthening the ability to write reports analyzing and presenting energy efficiency simulation results of composite cladding systems (polycarbonate + aluminum) using parametric tools: integration of data visualization (charts/graphs) and technical language.

By the end of the 1-week course, learners can verbally (including non-verbal expression) summarize an optimization design process considering both energy costs (electricity/fuel) and material costs (raw materials/waste disposal) in a given industrial case (e.g., battery manufacturing), propose three or more improvement measures (e.g., process efficiency, material substitution), and quantitatively compare and express cost-saving effects (at least 15%) using quantitative data.

Cultivating the ability to document the results of applying an optimized hybrid cladding ratio (10% polycarbonate + 90% aluminum) in actual design cases as technical documentation, emphasizing accuracy in specialized vocabulary and technical report structure.

resources: Parametric Modeling Software (Rhino 7, Grasshopper, Honeybee Plugin)
Energy Simulation Dataset (Based on Arid Climate Regions)
Optimization Algorithm Learning Materials (Genetic Algorithm, Multivariate Polynomial Regression)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
